scripts.build:vendor: mkdir -p dist/vendor && rsync -r vendor/ dist/vendor/ && rsync node_modules/jquery-ui-touch-punch/jquery.ui.touch-punch.min.js dist/vendor/ dist/vendor/ && rsync --copy-links node_modules/climate-by-location/dist/climate_by_location.climate_explorer.bundle.js dist/vendor/
scripts.build:html: mkdir -p dist && npx template-literals --config config.yml --indexes --outdir dist/ pages/*.js
scripts.build:css: node-sass -o css/ scss/screen.scss --include-path node_modules/compass-mixins/lib/ --output-style expanded --source-comments && mkdir -p dist/css dist/fonts && rsync -r fonts dist/ && rsync -r css dist/
scripts.deploy:fli: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climate-explorer/ &&  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E34SU5ZJ0O3LC0 --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:nemac: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climateexplorer2.nemac.org/ &&  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1Q1S8U8911R6D --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:ce3dev: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climate-explorer3-dev.nemac.org/ &&  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E48HJ11B8EHXY --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:ce3-production: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climate-explorer3-prod.nemac.org/ &&  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1Q1S8U8911R6D --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:ce26-legacy: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climate-explorer26.nemac.org/ &&  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2HEBFH20UVKTH --paths '/*'
